overview: Reduced costs for GitHub-hosted runners are now in effect. We announced this update on December 16, 2025. GitHub users will see price reductions of up to 39% for GitHub-hosted runners, depending on the machines they use.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: Reduced costs for GitHub-hosted runners are now in effect. We announced this update on December 16, 2025. GitHub users will see price reductions of up to 39% for GitHub-hosted runners, depending on the machines they use.
Standard hosted runner usage in public repositories remains free.

detailed_explanation.title: Recommended resources
bullets: For full details regarding GitHub Actions pricing changes, see the Executive Insights post .
See runner pricing documentation for adjusted GitHub-hosted runner rates.
For help estimating your expected Actions usage cost, see the Actions pricing calculator .
For more details on upcoming GitHub Actions releases, see the GitHub public roadmap .

insights: For more details on upcoming GitHub Actions releases, see the GitHub public roadmap .
